Tomorrow, 6/1 (Saturday), is a big day for our school. There will be a lot of traffic on campus.
Please pay attention to the traffic control routes on campus. The route map are attached.

ğŸ“£Graduates are gathering~
All graduates, please be sure to wear your bachelor's uniform before entering the venue!!!!
Graduates from each school are requested to gather in the Polytechnic Building 2 and the Student Activity Center before 15:20 p.m. as shown in the attached picture;
The Academic Affairs Office has arranged little angels holding placards ğŸ˜‡ waiting for you here ~ see you there ~ (you will be notified separately if it rains)
When graduates enter the venue, there will still be little angels leading the group, but we are still afraid that there will be graduates who fail to follow, so we have attached a map of the location of the venue, so if you fall out of the group, you can take your seat~
ğŸ‘‰ï¸If you havenâ€™t registered and suddenly want to participate, we are very welcome, but please go to the reserved seats to avoid disturbing others!
